org.deeplearning4j.arbiter.optimize.runner.listener

Interface StatusListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArbiterStatusListener, BaseStatusListener, LoggingStatusListener

    public interface StatusListener
    The status Listener interface is used to inspect/track the status of execution, both for individual candidates, and for the optimisation runner overall.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCandidateIteration(CandidateInfo candidateInfo, java.lang.Object candidate, int iteration)
      This method may be called by tasks as they are executing.
      void onCandidateStatusChange(CandidateInfo candidateInfo, IOptimizationRunner runner, OptimizationResult result)
      Called when the status of the candidate is change.
      void onInitialization(IOptimizationRunner runner)
      Called when optimization runner starts execution
      void onRunnerStatusChange(IOptimizationRunner runner)
      Called when any of the summary stats change, for the optimization runner: number scheduled, number completed, number failed, best score, etc.
      void onShutdown(IOptimizationRunner runner)
      Called when optimization runner terminates

    • Method Detail

      • onInitialization

        void onInitialization(IOptimizationRunner runner)
        Called when optimization runner starts execution

      • onShutdown

        void onShutdown(IOptimizationRunner runner)
        Called when optimization runner terminates

      • onRunnerStatusChange

        void onRunnerStatusChange(IOptimizationRunner runner)
        Called when any of the summary stats change, for the optimization runner: number scheduled, number completed, number failed, best score, etc.

      • onCandidateStatusChange

        void onCandidateStatusChange(CandidateInfo candidateInfo,
                             IOptimizationRunner runner,
                             OptimizationResult result)
        Called when the status of the candidate is change. For example created, completed, failed.
        Parameters:
        candidateInfo - Candidate information
        runner - Optimisation runner calling this method
        result - Optimisation result. Maybe null.

      • onCandidateIteration

        void onCandidateIteration(CandidateInfo candidateInfo,
                          java.lang.Object candidate,
                          int iteration)
        This method may be called by tasks as they are executing. The intent of this method is to report partial results, such as different stages of learning, or scores/evaluations so far
        Parameters:
        candidateInfo - Candidate information
        candidate - Current candidate value/configuration
        iteration - Current iteration number
